malani gunarathna mahathmiya chudithayata bara wada sahitha wasara 2 1/2 ka sira danduwamak niyama kalaya.wirakodiyana rathnagiriya pradeshaye padinchikaruwaku chudithaya wiya.2000 agosthu masa 07 dina ho aasanna dinayaka halawatha mahadhikarana balasimawe pihiti kuda bingiriye di wayasa awurudu 16 ta adu balawayaskara dariyak paharagena gos apaharanaya kirima chudithayata thibu chodanawa wiya.2000 wasare agosthu masa dinaka rathri 12.00 ta pamana chudithaya thamawa marana bawata tharjanaya kara paharagena giya bawa dariya polisiyata di thibena prakashayaka sandahan wiya.
